actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and National Parks

official_title: A bill for the relief of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas A. Eichstadt.

summary.text: Allows two named persons to obtain from the Secretary of the Interior, upon proper payment, a right of use and occupancy of a certain property acquired by the United States for inclusion in the Sleeping Bear Dunes National Lakeshore.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas A. Eichstadt.
